investment.title: Investment Advice
investment.subtitle: Long-term wealth building strategies
investment.principle_1: Start Early - Time is your greatest asset
investment.principle_2: Diversify - Don't put all eggs in one basket
investment.principle_4: Think Long-term - Don't panic on short-term fluctuations
investment.principle_5: Minimize Costs - Watch out for high fees
investment.principle_1_desc: The younger you start investing, the more time your money has to grow through compounding.
investment.principle_2_desc: Spread your investments across different asset classes to reduce risk.
investment.principle_3_desc: Regular, consistent contributions are more important than timing the market.
investment.principle_4_desc: Focus on long-term growth and don't react to short-term market volatility.
investment.principle_5_desc: High fees can significantly impact your returns over time.
investment.breakdown.title: Investment Breakdown
investment.chart.title: Growth Projection Over Time
investment.chart.subtitle: Your investment value with monthly contributions and compound interest
investment.tips.title: Quick Investment Tips
investment.tips.item_1: Start with an emergency fund of 3-6 months of expenses before investing.
investment.tips.item_2: Consider low-cost index funds or ETFs for diversified, passive investing.
investment.tips.item_3: Use tax-advantaged accounts like 401(k) or IRA to maximize returns.
investment.tips.item_4: Rebalance your portfolio annually to maintain your target asset allocation.
investment.tips.item_5: Consider working with a financial advisor for personalized guidance.
